chapter.title: About This Guide
chapter.para: The Transaction Bridging Guide contains information on how to use &PRODUCT;. This guide provides information on how to integrate JTA (XA) and XTS (WS-AT) transactions using the transaction bridge. It provides a low level details on how the TXBridge is implemented and how to use it manually.

note.title: Note
note.para: Use the XTS administration and development guide for an explanation of how to use the TXBridge automatically.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This guide is most relevant for application developers working in environments that integrate traditional JavaEE transactions usage and transactional Web Services, and need a low level control of the TXBridge. Also for the developers who want to participate in the project.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: &PRODUCT; uses the Java programming language and this manual assumes that you are familiar with programming in Java. In addition, a familiarity with the JTA and XTS components of &PRODUCT; is assumed. You should read the relevant Programmer's Guides before tackling this document.
